group_1.narration: <Mikoto's Side>
The falling snow melted on my cheeks and@flowed like tears. My awareness was still dim.
What happened to us…after…?
Who is this woman…?@I can't remember, but—@Where's Hanna…?

group_1.textLeft: Don't move. You're still in danger.

group_1.textRight: N-no… Yachiyo…@You handle the others… I…
Back to Kamihama… What an absurd chill.@I can't stand it.
Come, lend me your assistance…@I'll carry her on my back.
Because if I leave you both like this…@I may as well have lost, no?
I can't bear the idea of it.

group_1.textCenter: Well, not for you.@Things kinda went to shit for you, huh?

group_1.textLeft: No point in sleeping around, y'know—
…Is that all? Back to sleep with you.
Senaaaaa...@You stole my magic from me, didn't you?

group_1.textRight: No, no, I'm just borrowing it, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Whatever.@Let's make tracks before the others come.

group_1.narration: And so we continued on our way…@Supporting each other with every step.
The end of our journey lay right before us.
Pushing our way through the thick layers@of snow took more effort than I'd imagined.@Walking became a challenge,@my legs grew tangled, and I…
Before I could even finish the thought,@I collapsed and took Hanna down with me.
My body could no longer move.@I felt myself sink, and my memories faded away@as if they were melting from my head.
I tried to stop it, to cling to whatever I could, but@my capacity to store memories had met its limit.
My memories are leaving me… @That was sad enough, but the fact I couldn't@remember what I'd forgotten was even worse…
Ahh… Where am I?@I feel so cold…so lonely…
I mustered all my strength to move my hands,@trying with all my might to budge my position,@to search for what was supposed to be there…
What was it I was looking for?@I had no idea…but I knew it had to be there.
My precious memories.
[textBlack:I thought I was crying,@but it was the snow touching my cheeks.]@[textBlack:Without realizing it, it began snowing…]@[textBlack:No wonder it was so cold.]
[textBlack:"...Found you."]
[textBlack:Someone's hand touched mine.]@[textBlack:It felt so warm and gentle…]
―Mikoto―@Hanna…?
―Hanna―@...Yeah. It's me.
―Mikoto―@You were right there…@I couldn't move at all…
―Hanna―@Same here…
Hanna… The one I love.@I love her. I knew that.
But…I couldn't remember anything else.
…I couldn't dare say that.@Wouldn't she be hurt if I told her…?@That's right, isn't it…?@To think I would be the only one who's forgotten…
―Hanna―@Hey…um…er…
―Hanna―@Mikoto?
I had no idea why, but just hearing her@say my name filled my heart with such joy.
I call her by her first name, so surely,@wouldn't she just call me Mikoto too…?@I'm sure nothing's changed, but…why…?
Why am I…so happy…?
―Hanna―@...Mikoto?
―Mikoto―@Y-yes?! What's wrong?
―Hanna―@Ah…erm…s-sure was a fun Christmas, huh?
Christmas…@When was that?
Oh, that's right, we had a Christmas party together.@We filled every inch of the room with shining,@colorful origami decorations and made tons of food…
―Mikoto―@It was so much fun. But you were awful at looping@the paper together… I ended up doing all the work!
―Hanna―@Ah yeah…that you did.@How'd I get to be such a klutz?
―Hanna―@At least I dressed up as Santa for you.
―Mikoto―@Yes, that's right! It was the very first time Santa@had ever brought a gift for me. I was over the moon.
―Hanna―@And thanks very much for your gift, Mikoto.@I'll keep that pen in a safe place.
―Mikoto―@No, you're supposed to actually use it…!
―Hanna―@Ahaha…
What a wonderful Christmas.@My first turkey ever tasted so good,@and we even got to have cake together…
Ahh…how dazzling.@The world is shining so brightly.
I know it's because the snow@reflects our memories back upon us,@making them sparkle alight.
―Mikoto―@Hanna, look… The snow is so beautiful.@It shines with so many colors.
―Mikoto―@Those are our memories falling upon the world…
―Hanna―@Yeah…I see 'em.
The snow is changing…@It turns into beautiful, colorful pieces...@Falling like drops all around us.
We are alone here in this world.
And it's so gentle and warm…@We should be able to find a peaceful rest here.
...Why am I so afraid, then?
Ahh, of course…@It's because no one will find me.@I'm all alone here.@No matter how much I cry,@no one will try looking for me…
All I wanted was warmth…
All I wanted was to be loved…
…Maybe it was wrong to want that.
―Mikoto―@Mother…
―Hanna―@...Don't worry. It's gonna be okay…
―Hanna―@I'll be with you forever…
―Hanna―@I'll always be…by your side…
Ah, yes... Hanna is here.@And with Hanna here...@There's nothing to be afraid of.
She's my hero. She's cool and strong.@She never gives up, and she always finds me.
...And she'll always be by my side!
The world is a terrible, frightening place.@But with Hanna here, I don't have to worry.
Yes... Since I have Hanna here,@I can become stronger too.@Since I have Hanna here…
I can be anything.
It's a kind of…magic, I suppose.
...Hey, Hanna. I want to be like you.@...No. I WILL be like you.
Because…
[textBlack:I know you can bring happiness@to the people you love!]
